name: CellsGame
description:
Playble version of my very first game!

You have one cell. From 1 cell to the body from 35 cells. But not all of cells want to live to each other. Check their synergies and stats and prevent your body from diyng. If you don't like your cell - destroy it and get 2 of its childs!

The main quest is - get 35 cells in 200 turns.

in the development:

- custom main quest

- new HUD

- new sprites

- bonuses

- loops

and more...
